documents.document: @litlearningzone Oh my goodness - no guilt! I am not forgetting. I am abstaining. Will send you a DM

To @JunckerEU, take the lead & stop delaying widening the ban on bee-killing #neonics. New & damning EFSA report on these toxic chemicals makes action all the more urgent - for our #bees and for our planetâ€™s future

It's @nErDcampBham day! My favourite Sunday of the year. Thanks to the amazing @MrShafferTMCE for his vision, literacy passion and organization. It's going to be a great day!

Can't wait for #wwuclc18 tomorrow! Worth driving out of snowy Vancouver to arrive in beautiful Bellingham And then @nErDcampBham on Sunday! It's #booklove heaven

@Jenann4r @mariapwalther It's nice - especially when I live less than 15 minutes walk from the school. Leave my plants there all summer and pop in to water and organize here and there. Also do some intense days of cleaning/organizing

@erringreg Sorry - I just don't know for intermediate curriculum like this. Was there a specific competency or content you were looking at? Not sure if I will be able to help
@LC27LadyB I have always cleaned like this. The end result is wonderful. But sure takes time!
